title: Ghost Games desu
body:
tl;dr: you're stuck in a ghost game, stop complaining and just wait it out

Ok, @ everyone asking riot for help about being stuck in the end-game screen, from my knowledge as a s2 veteran, you're stuck in what is called a "ghost game" and this may take up to 2 hours to resolve. The people who win should get their wins but i can't guarantee it and the people who lose will get loss prevented.... probably. Ghost games are usually caused with server problems and with ranked being taken down in the past 2 hours, there have been troubles. Only solution is to wait it out i guess unless a miracle happens. Also try to like stop playing because you'll probs have problems in the champion select screen. Good day to you all.
